name: SIBO & Gut Healing Stack (Ordered)
mechanism: BPC-157 repairs gut mucosa and modulates motility while KPV provides targeted anti-inflammatory signaling via NF-κB and MAPK pathway modulation. Both can be taken orally for direct gut targeting
cycling: Run for 4-8 weeks for gut healing, can extend if needed
synergy_notes: BPC-157 handles structural repair and motility while KPV specifically targets inflammatory signaling. The combination addresses both repair and inflammation aspects of SIBO and gut issues
considerations: Oral administration allows direct gut tissue contact
Both transported via intestinal peptide transporters
May combine with antimicrobial SIBO protocols
order_status: Both peptides were ordered for gut healing
special_notes: This is the most cost-effective and targeted approach for SIBO and inflammatory gut conditions from the conversation recommendations
